trans-unit.source: XSLT and XPath functions.
trans-unit.target: Funções XSLT e XPath.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the base URI of the node of the node passed in by the navigator parameter.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor do URI base do nó do nó transmitido navigator parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_baseUri" name="baseUri" href=""></xref> XPath function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_baseUri" name="baseUri" href=""> </xref> função XPath em conformidade com a [W3C especificação](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> instance that contains the node to be identified by URI.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> instância que contém o nó seja identificado pelo URI.

trans-unit.source: The base URI as <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: O URI base como <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_contains" name="contains" href=""></xref> XPath function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_contains" name="contains" href=""> </xref> função XPath em conformidade com a [W3C especificação](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).

trans-unit.source: The string in which to locate `s2`.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia na qual pretende localizar `s2`.

trans-unit.source: The string to locate in s1.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia a localizar no s1.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the first argument string contains the second argument string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a primeira cadeia de argumento contém a cadeia de argumento segundo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements [exsl:object-type](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143941).
trans-unit.target: Implementa [exsl:object-tipo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143941).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem"></xref> of which to determine type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem"> </xref> deles determinar o tipo.

trans-unit.source: Object type as <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de objeto como <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref uid="langword_csharp_lang" name="lang" href=""></xref> function according to the [W3C XPath specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143942).
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_lang" name="lang" href=""> </xref> funcionar de acordo com o [W3C XPath especificação](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143942).

trans-unit.source: The specified string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object that contains context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>objeto que contém o contexto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:format-date" name="ms:format-date" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms-format-time" name="ms-format-time" href=""></xref>[Microsoft XPath extension functions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:format-date" name="ms:format-date" href=""> </xref> e <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms-format-time" name="ms-format-time" href=""> </xref> [as funções da extensão Microsoft XPath](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).

trans-unit.source: String that contains date/time data.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia que contém dados de data/hora.

trans-unit.source: String that contains format.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia que contém o formato.

trans-unit.source: String that contains language.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia que contém o idioma.

trans-unit.source: Boolean value that indicates whether date/time contains a date.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica se a data/hora contém uma data.

trans-unit.source: String that contains formatted date and time.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia que contém a formatados data e hora.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:local-name" name="ms:local-name" href=""></xref>[Microsoft XPath extension function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:local-name" name="ms:local-name" href=""> </xref> [função de extensão da Microsoft XPath](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).

trans-unit.source: The name.
trans-unit.target: O nome.

trans-unit.source: Name as <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Nome como <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:namespace-uri" name="ms:namespace-uri" href=""></xref>[Microsoft XPath extension function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:namespace-uri" name="ms:namespace-uri" href=""> </xref> [função de extensão da Microsoft XPath](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).

trans-unit.source: The name.
trans-unit.target: O nome.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Namespace URI as <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: URI de espaço de nomes como <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:number" name="ms:number" href=""></xref>[Microsoft XPath extension function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:number" name="ms:number" href=""> </xref> [função de extensão da Microsoft XPath](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> de <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:string-compare" name="ms:string-compare" href=""></xref>[Microsoft XPath extension function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:string-compare" name="ms:string-compare" href=""> </xref> [função de extensão da Microsoft XPath](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).

trans-unit.source: The first string to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira cadeia a comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second string to compare.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de segunda a comparar.

trans-unit.source: The language.
trans-unit.target: O idioma.

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Opcional

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the comparison is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se a comparação é maiúsculas e minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: If s1 < s2 the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: If s1 < s2 the method returns -1.

trans-unit.source: If s1 == s2 the method returns 0.
trans-unit.target: If s1 == s2 the method returns 0.

trans-unit.source: If s1 > s2 the method returns 1.
trans-unit.target: If s1 > s2 the method returns 1.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:utc" name="ms:utc" href=""></xref>[Microsoft XPath extension function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_ms:utc" name="ms:utc" href=""> </xref> [função de extensão da Microsoft XPath](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).

trans-unit.source: Converts date/time-related values into Coordinated Universal Time and into a fixed (normalized) representation that can be sorted and compared lexicographically.
trans-unit.target: Converte valores de data/hora-relacionados com o na hora Universal coordenada e para uma representação (normalizada) fixa que pode ser ordenada e comparado com lexicographically.

trans-unit.source: String that contains date/time data.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia que contém dados de data/hora.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains date/time information.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém informações de data/hora.

trans-unit.source: If a string cannot be interpreted as a valid XSD date/time-related format, it returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Se for uma cadeia não pode ser interpretada como um formato de data/hora-relacionadas com XSD válido, devolve uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: Removes leading and trailing spaces from the specified string and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: Remove espaços da cadeia especificado à esquerda e e devolve o resultado.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_normalize-space" name="normalize-space" href=""></xref> function from the [W3C XPath standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_normalize-space" name="normalize-space" href=""> </xref> funcionar do [W3C XPath padrão](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).

trans-unit.source: The specified string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia especificada.

trans-unit.source: A normalized string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia normalizada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup representing the opening and closing tags of the node and all child nodes of the node identified by the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> argument.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que representa a abertura e fecho de etiquetas de nó e todos os nós subordinados do nó identificado pelo <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> argumento.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> that identifies the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>que identifica o nó.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the opening and closing tags of the node and all child nodes of the node that is identified by the navigator parameter.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém a abertura e fecho de etiquetas de nó e todos os nós subordinados do nó que é identificado pelo navigator parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Rounds value by using XPath rounding rules.
trans-unit.target: Valor de Arredonda utilizando o XPath arredondamento regras.

trans-unit.source: Rounds towards positive infinity.
trans-unit.target: Arredonda para o infinito positivo.

trans-unit.source: Values between -0.5 and -0.0 are rounded to -0.0 (negative zero).
trans-unit.target: Os valores entre-0.5 e-0.0 são arredondados a-0.0 (negativo zero).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Double> number to round.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>número a arredondar.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The rounded number as <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: O número arredondado como <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_starts-with" name="starts-with" href=""></xref> XPath function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_starts-with" name="starts-with" href=""> </xref> função XPath em conformidade com a [W3C especificação](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).

trans-unit.source: A string, the beginning of which is compared to `s2`.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia, o início do qual é comparado com `s2`.

trans-unit.source: The string to compare to the beginning of `s1`.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia a comparar com o início do `s1`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the first argument string starts with the second argument string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a primeira cadeia de argumento for iniciado com a segunda cadeia argumento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_substring" name="substring" href=""></xref> XPath function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_substring" name="substring" href=""> </xref> função XPath em conformidade com a [W3C especificação](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).

trans-unit.source: The string from which to retrieve the substring.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia a partir do qual obter a subcadeia.

trans-unit.source: The starting character position of a substring in `s`.
trans-unit.target: A posição de caráter inicial de uma subcadeia no `s`.

trans-unit.source: The substring of the first argument starting at the position specified in the second argument
trans-unit.target: A subcadeia do primeiro argumento começadas na posição especificada no segundo argumento

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_substring" name="substring" href=""></xref> XPath function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_substring" name="substring" href=""> </xref> função XPath em conformidade com a [W3C especificação](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).

trans-unit.source: The string from which to retrieve the substring.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia a partir do qual obter a subcadeia.

trans-unit.source: The starting character position of a substring in `s`.
trans-unit.target: A posição de caráter inicial de uma subcadeia no `s`.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the substring.
trans-unit.target: O número de carateres da subcadeia.

trans-unit.source: The substring of the first argument, starting at the position specified in the second argument, with the length specified in the third argument.
trans-unit.target: A subcadeia do primeiro argumento, começando na posição especificada no segundo argumento, com o comprimento especificado no terceiro argumento.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_substring-after" name="substring-after" href=""></xref> XPath function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_substring-after" name="substring-after" href=""> </xref> função XPath em conformidade com a [W3C especificação](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).

trans-unit.source: Locates a substring (s2) within a string (s1), and returns the characters in s1 that occur after s2.
trans-unit.target: Localiza uma subcadeia (s2) dentro de uma cadeia (s1) e devolve os carateres s1 que ocorram após s2.

trans-unit.source: The string in which to locate s2.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia na qual pretende localizar s2.

trans-unit.source: The string to locate in `s1`.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia a localizar no `s1`.

trans-unit.source: The characters in s1 that occur after s2, or the empty string if s1 does not contain s2.
trans-unit.target: Os carateres na s1 que ocorram após s2 ou a cadeia vazia se s1 não contém s2.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_substring-before" name="substring-before" href=""></xref> XPath function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_substring-before" name="substring-before" href=""> </xref> função XPath em conformidade com a [W3C especificação](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).

trans-unit.source: Locates a substring (s2) within a string (s1), and returns the characters in s1 that occur before s2.
trans-unit.target: Localiza uma subcadeia (s2) dentro de uma cadeia (s1) e devolve os carateres s1 que ocorrem antes de s2.

trans-unit.source: The string in which to locate s2.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia na qual pretende localizar s2.

trans-unit.source: The string to locate in `s1`.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia a localizar no `s1`.

trans-unit.source: The characters in s1 that occur before s2, or the empty string if s1 does not contain s2.
trans-unit.target: Os carateres na s1 que ocorrem antes de s2 ou a cadeia vazia se s1 não contém s2.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_system-property" name="system-property" href=""></xref> XSLT function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=49919).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_system-property" name="system-property" href=""> </xref> função XSLT em conformidade com a [W3C especificação](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=49919).

trans-unit.source: The name of the system property.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade de sistema.

trans-unit.source: The value of the system property specified by the name.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade de sistema especificado pelo name .

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref uid="langword_csharp_translate" name="translate" href=""></xref> XPath function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref uid="langword_csharp_translate" name="translate" href=""> </xref> função XPath em conformidade com a [W3C especificação](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).

trans-unit.source: Converts a string (`arg`) by replacing the characters in a substring (`mapString`) with the characters in another string (`tranString`).
trans-unit.target: Converte uma cadeia (`arg`), substituindo os carateres de uma subcadeia (`mapString`) com outra cadeia de carateres (`tranString`).

trans-unit.source: The original string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de original.

trans-unit.source: The substring in `arg` that should be replaced with `transString`.
trans-unit.target: A subcadeia no `arg` que deve ser substituído pela `transString`.

trans-unit.source: The string to replace `mapString` with.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia para substituir `mapString` com.

trans-unit.source: The translated value as <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: O valor traduzido como <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>
